name: api_2d_Sprite
description: Represents a Sprite object for use in 2D gameplay.

properties.name: associatedAlphaSplitTexture
properties.description: Returns the Texture that contains the alpha channel from the source Texture. Unity generates this Texture under the hood for Sprites that have alpha in the source, and need to be compressed using techniques like ETC1.Returns NULL if there is no associated alpha Texture for the source Sprite. This is the case if the Sprite has not been setup to use ETC1 compression.

properties.name: border
properties.description: Returns the border sizes of the Sprite.

properties.name: bounds
properties.description: Bounds of the Sprite, specified by its center and extents in world space units.

properties.name: packed
properties.description: Returns true if this Sprite is packed in an atlas.

properties.name: packingMode
properties.description: If Sprite is packed (see Sprite.packed), returns its SpritePackingMode.

properties.name: packingRotation
properties.description: If Sprite is packed (see Sprite.packed), returns its SpritePackingRotation.

properties.name: pivot
properties.description: Location of the Sprite's pivot point in the Rect on the original Texture, specified in pixels.

properties.name: pixelsPerUnit
properties.description: The number of pixels in the Sprite that correspond to one unit in world space. (Read Only)

properties.name: rect
properties.description: Location of the Sprite on the original Texture, specified in pixels.

properties.name: spriteAtlasTextureScale
properties.description: The Variant scale of Texture used by the Sprite. This is useful to check when a Variant SpriteAtlas is being used by Sprites.

properties.name: texture
properties.description: Get the reference to the used Texture. If packed this will point to the atlas, if not packed will point to the source Sprite.

properties.name: textureRect
properties.description: Get the rectangle this Sprite uses on its Texture. Raises an exception if this Sprite is tightly packed in an atlas.

properties.name: textureRectOffset
properties.description: Gets the offset of the rectangle this Sprite uses on its Texture to the original Sprite bounds. If Sprite mesh type is FullRect, offset is zero.

properties.name: triangles
properties.description: Returns a copy of the array containing Sprite mesh triangles.

properties.name: uv
properties.description: The base Texture coordinates of the Sprite mesh.

properties.name: vertices
properties.description: Returns a copy of the array containing Sprite mesh vertex positions.

properties.name: AddScriptableObject
properties.description: Adds a ScriptableObject reference to the sprite.

properties.name: GetPhysicsShape
properties.description: Gets a physics shape from the Sprite by its index.

properties.name: GetPhysicsShapeCount
properties.description: The number of physics shapes for the Sprite.

properties.name: GetPhysicsShapePointCount
properties.description: Retrieves the number of points in the selected physics shape for the sprite.
